title: Snickerdoodles With a Hint of Ginger

Directions.1: Beat 1 1/2 cups sugar, butter, eggs, and vanilla extract together in a large bowl until smooth and creamy.

Directions.2: Sift all-purpose flour, oat flour, cream of tartar, and baking soda together into a bowl. Beat 1/2 of the flour mixture into butter mixture; and remaining flour mixture and beat until dough is just combined. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate until chilled, about 30 minutes.

Directions.3: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper.

Directions.4: Whisk 2 tablespoons sugar, cinnamon, and ginger together in a shallow bowl.

Directions.5: Roll chilled dough into 1 1/2-inch balls and roll each ball in cinnamon-sugar mixture to coat. Place coated dough 2-inches apart on prepared baking sheets.

Directions.6: Bake in the preheated oven until golden and set, 9 to 11 minutes. Cool on the baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely.
